header.title: IT Industry Salary Guide
header.subtitle: Technology career salaries and compensation trends

intro.paragraph1: The IT industry offers some of the highest salaries and best job opportunities in today's economy. From software development to cybersecurity, data science to cloud engineering, IT careers provide excellent compensation and growth potential.
intro.paragraph2: This guide explores salary ranges, career progression, and key factors influencing compensation in the technology sector.

locationFactors.title: Location Impact on IT Salaries
locationFactors.remoteWork: Remote work can reduce location premium by 10-20%

tips.title: Continuous Learning
tips.advice: Technology evolves rapidly. Dedicate time weekly to learning new skills and staying current with industry trends.

tips.title: Build a Portfolio
tips.advice: Create a GitHub portfolio, contribute to open-source projects, and showcase your work to demonstrate skills.

tips.title: Network Actively
tips.advice: Attend tech conferences, join local meetups, and connect with professionals on LinkedIn to build your network.

tips.title: Specialize Strategically
tips.advice: Choose specializations based on market demand and your interests. AI/ML, cloud, and cybersecurity are high-growth areas.

tips.title: Consider Certifications
tips.advice: Industry-recognized certifications can validate your skills and often lead to salary increases.

futureOutlook.title: IT Industry Outlook
challenges: Rapid technological change requiring continuous learning
